useCase.name: Complete Task
useCase.description: As a user, I want to complete a task in order to mark it as finished.

preconditions.precondition: The task must be assigned to the user.

successEndConditions.condition: The task is marked as completed.

failureEndConditions.condition: The task cannot be completed due to an error.

useCase.trigger: User selects the task completion option.

mainSequence.step: Foo1 initiates the task completion process.
Foo1 confirms the completion of the task.
